name: AIA_RULE_NormalizeValue
sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!isList: rule!SHRD_IsList(value: ri!value),
  local!isNumber: or(
    rule!SHRD_IsNumber(value: ri!value),
    and(
      local!isList,
      rule!SHRD_IsNumber(value: index(ri!value, 1, null))
    )
  ),
  local!isText: or(
    runtimetypeof(ri!value) = 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
    runtimetypeof(ri!value) = 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text?list'
  ),
  a!match(
    value: ri!value,
    whenTrue: local!isNumber,
    then: cast(
      'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Decimal?list',
      ri!value
    ),
    whenTrue: local!isText,
    then: cast(
      'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text?list',
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        {ri!value},
        rule!AIA_RULE_NormalizeString(string: fv!item)
      )
    ),
    default: ri!value
  )
)
